notice_message.en:
BEWARE OF FRAUDSTERS: WE HAVE NOT INVITED ANY REQUESTS FOR DEALERSHIP/FRANCHISE. DO NOT TRUST ANYONE OFFERING SUCH A FACILITY AND SEEKING MONEY IN IFFCO’S NAME.
Save More with Reward Points: Get 4% Unlimited Cashback on Every Prepaid Order. | FREE HOME DELIVERY | CASH ON DELIVERY AVAILABLE | 100% Original Products.
notice_message.bn: জালিয়াতি থেকে সাবধান: বর্তমানে, আমরা ফ্র্যাঞ্চাইজি স্টোরের জন্য কোনো অনুরোধ গ্রহণ করছি না। অতএব, এই ধরনের সুবিধা প্রদান করে এবং আমাদের নামে অর্থ চাওয়া কাউকে বিশ্বাস করবেন না।
notice_message.hi: धोखाधड़ी से सावधान रहें: अभी हम नए फ्रेंचाइजी स्टोर के लिए कोई आवेदन नहीं ले रहे हैं। इसलिए, ऐसी सुविधा देने वाले और हमारे नाम पर पैसे मांगने वाले किसी भी व्यक्ति या वेबसाइट पर भरोसा न करें।
notice_message.ka: ವಂಚನೆಯ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಎಚ್ಚರದಿಂದಿರಿ: ಪ್ರಸ್ತುತ, ನಾವು ಫ್ರಾಂಚೈಸಿ ಅಂಗಡಿಗಳಿಗೆ ಯಾವುದೇ ವಿನಂತಿಯನ್ನು ಸ್ವೀಕರಿಸುತ್ತಿಲ್ಲ. ಆದ್ದರಿಂದ, ಅಂತಹ ಸೌಲಭ್ಯವನ್ನು ನೀಡುವ ಮತ್ತು ನಮ್ಮ ಹೆಸರಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಹಣವನ್ನು ಹುಡುಕುವ ಯಾರನ್ನೂ ನಂಬಬೇಡಿ.
notice_message.gu: છેતરપિંડીથી સાવધ રહો: ​​હાલમાં, અમે ફ્રેન્ચાઇઝી સ્ટોર્સ માટેની કોઈપણ વિનંતી સ્વીકારતા નથી. આથી, આવી સુવિધા આપનાર અને અમારા નામે પૈસા માંગનાર કોઈપણ પર વિશ્વાસ કરશો નહીં.

notice_message.pu: ਧੋਖਾਧੜੀ ਤੋਂ ਸਾਵਧਾਨ ਰਹੋ: ਵਰਤਮਾਨ ਵਿੱਚ ਅਸੀਂ ਨਵੇਂ ਫ੍ਰੈਂਚਾਈਜ਼ੀ ਸਟੋਰਾਂ ਲਈ ਕੋਈ ਐਪਲੀਕੇਸ਼ਨ ਨਹੀਂ ਲੈ ਰਹੇ ਹਾਂ। ਇਸ ਲਈ, ਅਜਿਹੀ ਸਹੂਲਤ ਦੇਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਅਤੇ ਸਾਡੇ ਨਾਮ 'ਤੇ ਪੈਸੇ ਮੰਗਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਕਿਸੇ ਵੀ ਵਿਅਕਤੀ ਜਾਂ ਵੈਬਸਾਈਟ 'ਤੇ ਭਰੋਸਾ ਨਾ ਕਰੋ ਜੀ।

seo_content_home.en:
IFFCO BAZAR is an online agriculture market and platform that offers a modern retail experience to Indian farmers. At IFFCO BAZAR, you get easy access to an online farmers’ store as well as to services like charcha manch, free soil testing, and a lot more.

Choose from a wide range of seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, cattle feed, bio stimulants, sprayers, and other Agri implements and buy farm products online with ease.

 

The Establishment of the Online Agri Store

With an aim to connect all the farmers and cooperative societies in India, IFFCO, one of the largest cooperatives in the world, launched “www.dev2api.in” Agri e-commerce store. The platform was launched in line with the government’s initiative of ‘Digital India’ and offers the perfect platform that allows for seamless communication and commerce between IFFCO and its Joint Ventures, with consumers, and between various societies.

The platform is available in 12 different regional languages including English and Hindi which ensures effortless connectivity between rural India and the rest of the country.

In order to empower the farmers of the country in having more control over the commercial aspect of their businesses, this online Agri store also offers several benefits like the free home delivery scheme, Cash on delivery and no minimum order value for the rural areas of India.

 

Features of IFFCO BAZAR

Designed to offer complete convenience to Indian farmers and rural societies in the country, IFFCO BAZAR is available in 12 regional languages. This includes Hindi, English, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Assamese, and Oriya. The availability in regional languages helps ensure a wide reach for the online Agri store and makes it exceedingly easy for people to buy farm products online from wherever they are.

 

The platform offers easy registration for societies and individuals using only their mobile number and offers collective information about the platform and its various schemes, business and career opportunities for individuals.

 

One of the best online shopping websites for agriculture, people also get access to discussion forums where they can easily ask questions or share ideas and best practices. The forum also has facilities that allow commenting and voting to ensure an interactive experience for everyone.

 

A very important feature of the IFFCO BAZAR platform and its online farmers’ store is KisanMitr –Friends of the Farmers Project. An initiative by the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser, Government of India, the project is aimed at helping Indian farmers become more self-reliant, offering them insights and recommendations that are based on information gleaned from numerous data sources from various departments of the Government.

 

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agriculture market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

One of the top online shopping websites for agriculture, IFFCO BAZAR offers Cash on Delivery along with safe and secure avenues for processing online payments, including credit or debit card and internet banking. IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offering the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agriculture market in India in the short time since its establishment.

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agriculture market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

One of the top online shopping websites for agriculture, IFFCO BAZAR offers Cash on Delivery along with safe and secure avenues for processing online payments, including credit or debit card and internet banking. IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offering the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agriculture market in India in the short time since its establishment.
seo_content_home.ta:
IFFCO BAZAR is an online agriculture market and platform that offers a modern retail experience to Indian farmers. At IFFCO BAZAR, you get easy access to an online farmers’ store as well as to services like charcha manch, free soil testing, and a lot more.

Choose from a wide range of seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, cattle feed, bio stimulants, sprayers, and other Agri implements and buy farm products online with ease.

 

The Establishment of the Online Agri Store

With an aim to connect all the farmers and cooperative societies in India, IFFCO, one of the largest cooperatives in the world, launched “www.dev2api.in” Agri e-commerce store. The platform was launched in line with the government’s initiative of ‘Digital India’ and offers the perfect platform that allows for seamless communication and commerce between IFFCO and its Joint Ventures, with consumers, and between various societies.

The platform is available in 12 different regional languages including English and Hindi which ensures effortless connectivity between rural India and the rest of the country.

In order to empower the farmers of the country in having more control over the commercial aspect of their businesses, this online Agri store also offers several benefits like the free home delivery scheme, Cash on delivery and no minimum order value for the rural areas of India.

 

Features of IFFCO BAZAR

Designed to offer complete convenience to Indian farmers and rural societies in the country, IFFCO BAZAR is available in 12 regional languages. This includes Hindi, English, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Assamese, and Oriya. The availability in regional languages helps ensure a wide reach for the online Agri store and makes it exceedingly easy for people to buy farm products online from wherever they are.

 

The platform offers easy registration for societies and individuals using only their mobile number and offers collective information about the platform and its various schemes, business and career opportunities for individuals.

 

One of the best online shopping websites for agriculture, people also get access to discussion forums where they can easily ask questions or share ideas and best practices. The forum also has facilities that allow commenting and voting to ensure an interactive experience for everyone.

 

A very important feature of the IFFCO BAZAR platform and its online farmers’ store is KisanMitr –Friends of the Farmers Project. An initiative by the Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser, Government of India, the project is aimed at helping Indian farmers become more self-reliant, offering them insights and recommendations that are based on information gleaned from numerous data sources from various departments of the Government.

 

Other features offered by IFFCO BAZAR that make it the best online agriculture market available to Indian farmers today include learn-by-self capabilities with videos, blogs, and other content on topics like the best practices in farming or rearing live-stock, soil testing, means of cashless payments, and so on; online buying facilities for the products and services offered by all verticals of IFFCO and its Joint Ventures; access to information regarding future events, including farmers meet, medical or veterinary check-ups; and much more.

 

About Payments at IFFCO BAZAR

IFFCO BAZAR guarantees completely safe transactions and confidentiality for your payment information. With these features and much more, we are dedicated to offering the best services to Indian farmers, empowering them to take control of their business. Owing to this, IFFCO BAZAR has become the top online agriculture market in India in the short time since its establishment.
